author: lgray
body:
Implements a number of baseline objects that are needed for navigation and basic importing of RecHits from the calorimeter upgrade proposals.

Includes a functioning basic Shashlik PFCluster demonstrator using fake rechits built from scaling sim energy.
Should also get rid of the crash in HGC scenarios from trying to access the preshower geometry.
title: Baseline needs for Shashlik/HGC to be in PF
